requirements.text: Create the ready-to-use application named "KDS Ai Image Generator Pro" with a complete shell: app header, sidebar (or top nav) listing all tools, a landing/dashboard page, and a consistent layout that works on desktop and mobile.

quotes: Buatkan Aplikasi Siap Pakai Dengan Nama "KDS Ai Image Generator Pro"

acceptanceCriteria: The app name "KDS Ai Image Generator Pro" appears in the header and page titles
There is a dashboard page that links to every requested tool
Navigation works on mobile (responsive) and desktop

requirements.text: Add a "Tools" catalog that includes these dedicated tool pages: Logo Maker, Mockup Creator, Mini World Generator, Barbershop Stylist, Outpainting, POV Hand Creator, Background Removal, AI Retouch, Product Photographer, Sketch & Pencil Art, Wedding & Prewedding Editor, ID Photo Booth, Architectural Design Visualizer, Maternity Photo Editor, Big Head Caricature Generator, Infographic Poster Creator, Photo Restoration, Fashion Model Generator, Banner Design, Baby & Kids Photo Editor, Religious Event Photo Editor, Graduation Photo Editor, Age Transformation Filter, Magic Eraser, Collage Maker, and Filter Usia (Age Filter).

quotes: Expand the application to include the following AI tools: Logo Maker, Mockup Creator, Mini World Generator, Barbershop Stylist, Outpainting, POV Hand Creator, Background Removal, AI Retouch, Product Photographer, Sketch & Pencil Art, Wedding & Prewedding Editor, ID Photo Booth, Architectural Design Visualizer, Maternity Photo Editor, Big Head Caricature Generator, Infographic Poster Creator, Photo Restoration, Fashion Model Generator, Banner Design, Baby & Kids Photo Editor, Religious Event Photo Editor, Graduation Photo Editor, Age Transformation Filter, Magic Eraser, Collage Maker, and Filter Usia (Age Filter).

acceptanceCriteria: Each listed tool has its own route/page and is reachable from navigation
Each tool page shows the tool name, short description, and a configuration panel
All user-facing text on these pages is in English

requirements.text: For every tool page, implement dedicated presets and detailed configuration options: each tool must provide (a) a preset selector with at least 5 presets unique to that tool, (b) an "Advanced settings" section with at least 8 configurable fields relevant to the tool (sliders, selects, toggles, text inputs), and (c) a reset-to-default action per tool.

quotes: Ensure each tool has its own dedicated presets and detailed configuration options.

acceptanceCriteria: Each tool has >= 5 presets that change visible configuration values
Each tool has >= 8 advanced configuration inputs (types mixed: slider/select/toggle/text)
Each tool supports "Reset" to restore the default preset/config

requirements.text: Implement a unified "Workspace" experience for all tools: input area (upload image(s) or choose blank canvas where relevant), live preview area, and an output area with download/export controls. The UI must clearly indicate required vs optional inputs per tool.
acceptanceCriteria: Every tool page has Input, Preview, and Output sections
Tools that are generation-first (e.g., Logo Maker, Mini World Generator, Infographic Poster Creator, Banner Design) support starting from a blank canvas
Tools that are edit-first (e.g., Background Removal, Magic Eraser, AI Retouch, Photo Restoration) require an image upload and show a clear validation message in English when missing

requirements.text: Provide functional, offline-capable processing behavior for each tool using client-side image operations (Canvas/Web APIs) so the app is usable without relying on external AI services. Where a requested tool implies AI (e.g., background removal/outpainting/hand creation), implement a best-effort non-AI approximation (filters, masks, inpainting-like blur/clone, crop/extend canvas, compositing, stylization) and clearly label results as "Local processing preview" in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the primary action (e.g., "Generate" / "Apply") produces a visible changed preview/output for each tool using local processing
The UI includes the label "Local processing preview" on tool results that are approximations of AI behavior
The user can export/download the produced image (PNG) for each tool

requirements.text: Add backend persistence for user projects and tool runs: authenticated users can save (a) tool type, (b) selected preset, (c) configuration values, (d) timestamps, and (e) references/metadata for input/output assets. Include list, view details, rename, and delete actions.
acceptanceCriteria: A signed-in user can create and save a project/tool run and see it in a "My Projects" list
A user can open a saved run and the tool page restores preset + configuration values
A user can rename and delete a saved run

requirements.text: Add an English-only onboarding/help layer: for each tool page include a concise "How it works" section that describes inputs, what presets do, and what the advanced settings control (no claims about external AI).

quotes: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.

acceptanceCriteria: Each tool page contains a "How it works" section in English
The text does not reference external AI providers or third-party model APIs

requirements.text: Implement a consistent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) across the whole app with a distinctive "dark studio" look (charcoal/graphite base, warm accent color like amber or coral, high-contrast panels, subtle grain texture). Apply it consistently to navigation, tool panels, forms, and preview canvas areas. Do not use a blue/purple primary theme.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent dark-studio theme with a warm accent color (not blue/purple primary)
Forms, buttons, and panels follow the same style system across tools
Preview/output areas are visually distinct and readable on dark backgrounds

requirements.text: Generate and include static brand assets for the app and render them in the UI: app logo and a dashboard hero/banner background stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (not served/generated by the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated and are used on the dashboard/header
The app renders correctly without any backend endpoint for images

constraints: Use English for all user-facing UI text.
Respect the single-actor backend architecture (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not modify any frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths; compose them instead.
Do not integrate external AI/LLM services; tool behavior must be implemented locally in the frontend and/or with on-chain persistence only.
nonGoals: Real-time collaboration, chat, or WebSocket-based features
Third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity if auth is used)
External databases or non-Motoko backend services
Claims of true AI generation (e.g., model-based background removal/outpainting) when only local approximations are implemented

required: App logo mark, modern monogram style, high contrast on dark background (kdsai-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide dashboard hero background, dark studio texture with warm accent lighting (kdsai-hero-bg.dim_1600x600.png)
Tool category icon set, minimal line icons, consistent stroke, warm accent (kdsai-tool-icons.dim_1024x1024.png)
